Package hipparcos.tools

Interface Summary
StarStore Simple interface for acepting Stars - used by StarLoader Hence to make use fo Star loader you need somwthing which implements StarStore.
 

Class Summary
Browser Allow interaction with an already running browser - the default one
Constants  
DelimitedLine Wraps up a line in s Stringtokenizeer using a given delimiter provide usefull casting methods to get back doubles etc.
Factory Get a HIPI from web or disk
HIPproperties Class to load properties from file and then be a singleton for thoose properties.
MainFrame  
Star A class to represent one entry in the hipparcos catalog not all fields are put in here just the ones used elsewhere could easily add them all but then chewing up memory
StarFactory For given alpha delta and d get all stars from the database in that area.
StarFactory3d For given alpha delta and d get all stars from the database in that area.
StarLoader This is a threaded class which uses a star factory to load data while the application still has control - as new Stars are manufactured they are put in the StarStore - StarStore also has interfaces for initialising the loader.
VectorPosition Position in 3 dimensions overlaps somewhat with javax.vecmath.vector3d.
 

Exception Summary
NoMoreStars Exception tjrown when a factory has no more stars
